description: Names of search fields that can be faceted/returned

enum.name: ModifiedBy
enum.description: User ID of the last user that modified this Entity

enum.name: ModifiedOn
enum.description: Unix Timestamp of when the Entity was last modified

enum.name: CreatedBy
enum.description: User ID of the user who created this Entity

enum.name: CreatedOn
enum.description: Unix Timestamp of when this Entity was created

enum.name: ConsortiumAnnotation
enum.description: Value of the Entity's Annotation with Key="consortium" if it exists

enum.name: DiseaseAnnotation
enum.description: Value of the Entity's Annotation with Key="disease" if it exists

enum.name: NumSamplesAnnotation
enum.description: Value of the Entity's Annotation with Key="numSamples" if it exists

enum.name: TissueAnnotation
enum.description: Value of the Entity's Annotation with Key="tissue" if it exists
